about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Full Stack Web Developer with
about.description1: Full Stack Developer with expertise in end-to-end web application development. Specialized in building responsive, modern web solutions using cutting-edge technologies across both frontend and backend ecosystems.
about.description2: Committed to continuous skill enhancement through adopting emerging technologies. Focused on delivering pixel-perfect UIs coupled with robust backend architectures, ensuring optimal performance and user satisfaction.

form.title: Send a Message
form.success: Sent successfully! We'll contact you soon.

q1.question: What services do you offer?
q1.answer: I offer web development services including front-end development, responsive design, and web application development using modern technologies.

q2.question: How much does a project cost?
q2.answer: The cost varies depending on the project type and requirements. I provide custom pricing for each project based on the scope of work and time required. You can contact me for a free quote.

q3.question: What is the typical project timeline?
q3.answer: Project timelines vary based on complexity. Small projects may take 1-2 weeks, while larger applications can take several months. I'll provide a detailed timeline after discussing your requirements.

q4.question: Do you provide ongoing support after project completion?
q4.answer: Yes, I offer different levels of ongoing support and maintenance packages. We can discuss the best option for your needs after project delivery.

footer.name: mohamed bader
footer.description: Full stack web developer specialized in building exceptional digital experiences using the latest technologies and tools.
